author: AP
title: UN chief warns COVID-19 threatens global peace and security
description: The closed meeting was the first by the council on the pandemic and afterward it issued its first brief press statement expressing “support for all efforts of the secretary-general concerning the potential impact of the COVID-19 pandemic to conflict-affected …
content: U.N. Secretary-General Antonio Guterres warned the U.N. Security Council on Thursday that the coronavirus pandemic is threatening international peace and security - potentially leading to an increase in social unrest and violence that would greatly undermine … [+3992 chars]
